extendedInfo.description: Turn your Android device into a customized Google TV remote. A Google TV featured app!"Able Remote Is a Supercharged Google TV Controller." - LifehackerâWhere the official Google TV remote app begins, Able Remote grabs the reigns and pushes things further in a way thatâs intuitive, full featured, and a mix of geeky and fun.â â Android Central"One of the five must-have Google TV Apps" - Geek.com"Able Remote is a must-try app for every Google TV ownerâ¦rating 4 out of 5 - Androinica"Navigate Google TV with touch gestures and voice commands. Share photos, videos and web pages with your TV. Forward notifications to your TV.If you're having any trouble, PLEASE CONTACT US at feedback@ableremote.com BEFORE RATING, so we can help you out and improve the App - your feedback really does help. We can't respond to reviews or comments.Features:- TV Touch navigation- Touch play controls- View photos and videos from your device on Google TV- Share web pages with the TV- Customize buttons (paid feature)- Launch your favorite apps- Jump to your favorite TV channels- View SMS, Caller ID and app notifications on your TV- Voice commands- Single button power on/off all devices- Control your TV, set-top box, audio receiver and Blu-ray player- Create macros that combine device, app and channel actions- Change the user interface color- Web bookmarks- Spotlight web apps- Weather and clock overlay- Trending posts from Google+- Android widget to remotely control Google TV Play Music- Share button layouts- Backups- Netflix Instant QueueNOTE: You also need to install the "Able Remote for Google TV" app on your Google TV device.To get started, connect your Android device to the same network as your Google TV.All the basic features of the app is free. Most of the features to edit or change the app is available for a nominal fee.Permissions:Receive SMS, Read contact data, Read phone state and identity - For any incoming SMS or phone calls, notifications will be forwarded to your Google TV. For the incoming calls, the phone number will be matched in the contacts list and used for the text of the notification.For technical reasons, the All Notifications setting in Able Remote uses Android's Accessibility service and must be enabled in the Android Accessibility settings. For convenience, options are provided on the Able Remote settings screen to go to the Accessibility settings. Just to be clear, Able Remote is intended to be a convenience tool and is not an accessibility tool. The Accessibility service will give a warning that Able Remote may be able to collect personal data. This is because Accessibility doesn't know what or how data passing through it is used by enabled apps. Able Remote only uses Accessibility to pass notification text to your Google TV and not used for any other purpose or stored.Caution:Be aware of the accessibility apps that are enabled when you enable Able Remote! Your phone behavior might be affected by other accessibility apps that were enabled when Accessibility was turned on.External storage is used for sharing button layouts and for storing backups.Vizio Co-Star:The Vizio Co-Star Google TV device does not have a built-in IR blaster. This means that apps like Able Remote cannot control devices attached to your Google TV device unless you follow these instructions:1. Disable power save mode on your Google TV for your physical remote (Settings -> Devices -> Bluetooth -> Vizio XRA700 Remote -> Remote power save -> Off)2. Place the physical remote so that it is pointing at the devices you want to control. Your physical remote will act as a IR blaster for controlling all the devices connected to your Google TV.

reviews.title: Simply Excellent
reviews.comment: With the GTV Tasker plugin this is perfect.  The more apps play nice together, the more powerful devices become.  I love that my calendar and phone call notifications show on the TV. :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing key
reviews.comment: This app is great. For revue can we get the fn key?  My fan and light are inferred and need that key to control them. Thanks
reviews.author: Erik Repp

reviews.title: Very neat idea..
reviews.comment: Functional application with tons of room for improvement. Looks cheap, however.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must-have for GoogleTV owners!
reviews.comment: This is the best GoogleTV remote app I have used. The ability to share images, video, web links, etc from other apps to GTV is a very convenient feature. This app blows away the official GoogleTV remote app!
reviews.author: George Jacob

reviews.title: Nexus 7 and Sony Ngz-gs7
reviews.comment: It worked great, but now it will never connect to my GTV. It says there is no Google TV connected even when I am on YouTube or streaming on Netflix. Please fix!
reviews.author: Marcos Rivera

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: That\'s what I\'m looking for, I\'ve tried several apps before but no one work like this one even the Google one.  Thank you so much,  keep the good work.
reviews.author: Jo\303\243o Claudio

reviews.title: PsUeDo-SaTiSfIeD
reviews.comment: I really love this app..... WHEN IT WORKS... you see, (and this app has always been like this, the whole 8 months that I\'ve been using it) when I go to launch this application, about 50% of the time it cannot connect to my LG 55\" GoogleTV on my stable, Hi-speed internet connection. Although when it does connect and it\'s functioning properly- my quality of life is improved significantly. I wish that I could give it 5 stars because it really is a fantastic app when it\'s functioning correctly.
reviews.author: jake manning

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This is just what I needed! Thanks. Works perfectly for me on Lenovo tablet with Logitec Revue.
reviews.author: Arnie Carlson

reviews.title: Annoying.
reviews.comment: I keep forgetting why I always uninstall this app. I absolutely hate that the D-pad only uses swipe gestures instead of button presses. It is a completely useless feature that should be optional. As an added bonus, this is the first app to crash my new Samsung Galaxy Tab 2. Seriously, the free Google TV Remote app works much better and it doesn\'t need a separate app installed on the STB. I hope I\'ll remember never to install this app again.
reviews.author: Paul Zahorosky

reviews.title: Motorola droid razer
reviews.comment: App is very handy, love not having to hunt remote all the time, this app works great on the Sony Google TV
reviews.author: Travis Ellis

reviews.title: Purty good!
reviews.comment: Definitely better than Google\'s own remote app. It would be nice to have a better switcher in-between GTVs though... Maybe something to show you which GTV box your on - like, a label on top?
reviews.author: Richard Hefner

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good

reviews.comment: I have a Sony google tv. N this device doesn\'t work with my tv. :\'( UNINSTALLING.

reviews.comment: Very good apps

reviews.title: Galaxy sII
reviews.comment: Why I can\'t use the applica. Why?? And u must answer, why i cant use for control toshiba tv??

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Does exactly what I\'ve been looking for. Controls the google tv easily and allows quick sharing of content from my phone/tablet. Excellent.

reviews.comment: Not comparable with the Samsung galaxy III  on AT&T uverse tv

reviews.comment: LOVING this app!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.title: A huge improvement over Standard GTV app
reviews.comment: The app is very customizable and provides many useful advantages over the Google GTV remote

reviews.comment: Can\'t change channel or do anything else after update
